post:
Hey all, unlike my last offers in OVH Canada and Bristol UK, these VPS's are slightly higher priced and for those looking for something a little more "premium". These offers do not come with DDoS protection, if you are looking for DDoS protected UK please check out [our previous offer.](https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/75199/budget-uk-vps-1gb-ram-15-yearly-100gbps-voxility-ddos-protection)

This line of VPS hosting is running out of AS62240 in Enfield London, on servers with E3-1270 v5 CPU's, DDR4 RAM and brand new hard drives.

**Some other bits you might be interested in**

* Native IPv6, request extra for FREE!
* Internal networking on request
* 24/7 staffed support, 1-4 hours ticket response time
* Free weekly on-site backups
* Redundant power and networking
* Automatic IPv4 and IPv6 rDNS from SolusVM

**Extra IP's are $12 a year with justification - [Read TOS before ordering](https://dedistation.com/TOS.html) (No virtual currency, Tor, utilising 100% CPU or Hitleap without asking)**

**Outgoing email is rate limited, open a ticket before high volume mailing to avoid issues**

> [LET UK Tiny - $10 Yearly - Click here to sign up](https://dedistation.com/billing/order.php?step=1&productGroup=13&product=22)
> ===============
> * **512**MB DDR4 RAM   
> * **15**GB Disk Space   
> * **1** CPU Core   
> * **300**GB Bandwidth @ 100Mbps   
> * **1** IPv4 Address   
> * **5** IPv6 Addresses   
> * **London, UK** Datacenter   
> * SolusVM Control Panel   

---

> [LET UK Small - $15 Yearly - Click here to sign up](https://dedistation.com/billing/order.php?step=1&productGroup=13&product=23)
> ===============
> * **2**GB DDR3 RAM  
> * **30**GB Disk Space   
> * **1** CPU Core   
> * **500**GB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps   
> * **1** IPv4 Address   
> * **5** IPv6 Addresses   
> * **London, UK** Datacenter   
> * SolusVM Control Panel   

---

> [LET UK Medium - $15 Semi-Annualy - Click here to sign up](https://dedistation.com/billing/order.php?step=1&productGroup=13&product=24)
> ===============
> * **3**GB DDR3 RAM  
> * **45**GB Disk Space   
> * **2** CPU Core   
> * **1**TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps   
> * **2** IPv4 Address   
> * **5** IPv6 Addresses   
> * **London, UK** Datacenter   
> * SolusVM Control Panel   

As always thank you for taking the time to read this offer, and please PM me or open a ticket with any questions!

Please send a PM on LET for test IPv4/6, or whois AS62240.
